page.title: 12A FARMER'S DAY HIGH WYCOMBE
page.content:
This is the day in the{life}of a farmer,who lives in Hard-To-Find Farm.
4:30am Gets up. 5:15am Starts morning milking of cows. 6:15am Turns out cows to graze on grass. 6:45am Has his breakfast,which is cooked by his wife, this consists of bacon,eggs,etc. 7:15am Feeds his chickens,of which he has a few. 7:30am Starts to do odd jobs 1:00pm Lunch,bread and cheese. 2:00pm Fieldwork. 3:30pm Afternoon milking.(End 4:30) 8:00pm Supper.Usually a meat meal. 8:45pm Inspects animals to see all is well. 11:00pm Bed.
